thread.title: Bluecore Named One of 2018’s Best Companies to Work for in New York State

author: cnbc.com
title: Bluecore Named One of 2018’s Best Companies to Work for in New York State
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bluecore is very pleased to announce that it has been named one of the Best Companies to Work for in New York State for 2018.
The Best Companies to Work for in New York State awards are celebrating 11 years of recognizing the best employers in the state. It is a distinctive program that evaluates and ranks the best places of employment based on employee satisfaction and engagement, as well as workplace practices and policies.
To be considered for participation, companies enter into a two-part survey process and fulfill the following eligibility requirements:
Be a for-profit or not-for-profit business or government entity Be a publicly or privately held business Have at least one facility in the state of New York Have a minimum of 15 employees working in the state of New York Be in business a minimum of 1 year
“At Bluecore, we’ve actively created a destination workplace,” said Laura Cooper, Senior Vice President of People at Bluecore. “The investment in people has allowed our company to scale dynamically from a startup to a VC-backed high growth company. We are deeply committed to maintaining an environment where everyone is inspired to self-actualize personally and professionally. As we link all of our ambitions to promote the strength of Bluecore and our people, you can expect to see amazing things from us in 2018.”
Bluecore will be honored at a public awards dinner to be held at the Albany Marriott on Wednesday, April 18, 2018, from 5:45 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. During the event, Bluecore will learn its rank among the 19 companies in the category for medium employers with 100-249 U.S. employees.
In addition, a special publication profiling all 70 winning organizations and their unique employment perks will be produced for distribution to event attendees, higher education institutions, as well as thousands of human resources professionals and organizations across New York State.
About Best Companies To Work For In New York State
The 2018 Best Companies to Work for in New York State awards is a partnership of the New York State Council of the Society for Human Resource Management, The Business Council of New York, Best Companies Group and BridgeTower Media. Event sponsor is Anchin Block & Anchin LLP.
About Bluecore
Bluecore is an AI-driven retail marketing platform specializing in email personalization. By bringing together and activating website, customer and–for the first time–dynamic product data, Bluecore solves the missing piece of the performance puzzle by helping retailers automatically respond to customer behaviors with triggered and individualized messages. Hundreds of brands and retailers use Bluecore to drive more revenue with less effort by connecting customers to the products they’ll love.
For more information on the Best Companies to Work for in New York State program, including the entire list of winning companies, please visit www.BestCompaniesNY.com or contact Emily Winslow at 717-323-5268 or ewinslow@cpbj.com .
